synthesis_conditions.equipment: Biotage Initiator microwave oven with 10 mL vials
synthesis_conditions.method_details: Suitable single crystals were obtained by mixing H3BTC and ground Bi(NO3)3·5H2O with 5 mL of MeOH at room temperature. The sealed glass vial was shaken by hand for 1 min and subsequently heated in the microwave oven.
